SELECT BOARD.TXT_NO ,BOARD.TITLE ,BOARD.SITE_NO ,SITE.SITE_NM ,CNTS.IMG_SEQ ,CNTS.IMG_URL
,'http://worksout.co.kr/upload/image'||CNTS.IMG_URL AS FRONT_IMG_URL ,CNTS.DTL_IMG_URL
,'http://worksout.co.kr/upload/image'||CNTS.DTL_IMG_URL AS FRONT_DTL_IMG_URL ,GDS.UBI_GDS_NO GDS_NO ,GDS.GDS_NM ,GDS.SL_PRC ,GDS.LINK_URL FROM TBL_CM_INTG_BOARD BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_AD_SITE SITE ON SITE.SITE_NO = BOARD.SITE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_CM_INTG_BOARD_CNTS CNTS ON BOARD.TXT_NO = CNTS.TXT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_CM_BOARD_GDS GDS ON CNTS.IMG_SEQ = GDS.IMG_SEQ WHERE BOARD.TXT_NO = #{txtNo} AND CNTS.IMG_CLS != 'CM00601' AND BOARD.BOARD_CLCD = 'CM00801' /* 룩북 */ ORDER BY CNTS.PRIR, GDS.PRIR
